title: The sacred months in Islam
transcript: she's asking about RAB Shan Ramadan and she said that these are sacred months and that this is not correct the sacred months in Islam are four three in a row and one isolated one the isolated one is rajab this one is on its own this is a sacred month in which is we are in and then there is andam the last two months of the calendar year and the first month of the calendar year these are the sacred months months that were mentioned in Surah in chapter n Surah atba
